description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
    
    New Features

   DIAGRAMNET-50946-Add support of inserting ActiveX controls in the Visio Page
   DIAGRAMNET-51003-Add support to set color checkbox of the layer 
   
    Bugs     
   DIAGRAMNET-50026-Shapes are missing from VSDX drawing
   DIAGRAMNET-50781-The small icons of the tables are missing on saving a VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50941-Incorrect retrieval of the Connects from a VSD  
   DIAGRAMNET-50942-An incorrect DPI is being set on saving in the TIFF
   DIAGRAMNET-50943-The connection of the dynamic connector is not being preserved on grouping shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-50945-An extra square is added around the circle shape on converting a VDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50948-Can't copy a Visio page in the VSDM
   DIAGRAMNET-50950-Can't set headers and footers of a VSDX diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-50951-Microsoft Visio 2013 viewer does not display a VSDX diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-50957-A table is missing on converting a VSDX to PNG 
   DIAGRAMNET-50978-Incomplete rendering of a dynamic connector in the VSDM diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-50998-Null reference error occurred while inserting a picture
   DIAGRAMNET-51001-Retrieves a reverse direction of the connector from a VSD diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-51004-The text alignment problem in converting a VSDX to PDF       
   DIAGRAMNET-51005-The text alignment and formatting problems on converting a VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51006-The bold text formatting is not being preserved on converting a VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51011-Returns incorrect connections, while retrieving from a VSD
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
